articles.author: Yordan
articles.title: Samsung US lets you snatch discounted Z Fold3 and Flip3 Bespoke edition in Winter sales event - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The American division has seven deals for seven different devices, with one each day until Dec 26.
articles.content:
Samsung launched today its Discover Winter shopping campaign in the United States. It offers discounts, freebies and enhanced trade-in values when you get one of the company's latest foldables.
The … [+1562 chars]

articles.title: In huge N.America opening, ‘Spider-Man’ rakes in $253 million - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Covid-schmovid: Sony and Marvel's new "Spider-Man: No Way Home" scored the third-biggest domestic opening of all time, taking in an estimated $253 million in its massive North American weekend opening.
